name: Synespectra
description:
Synespectra is an arcade-style action game which tests your aim and color-selection reflexes. Music makes enemy bullets fly towards your disc in the center of the screen. Your task is to take out as many as you can by matching the color of your shield and bullets with theirs.

The controls are simple:

  • Mouse for aiming,
  • Left click to fire,
  • Q - red
  • W - green
  • E - blue
  • A - teal
  • S - magenta
  • D - yellow
  • ESC - pause menu/exit

The game features difficulty scaling, visuals that adapt to your performance, and a high score list.

You can try one of the included songs, or use your own audio files by simply copying them to the game's "data" directory.

The game requires Java version 8 or newer.
